title: Edinburgh/West
name: Edinburgh Zoo
directions: Catch Lothian Buses 12, 26, 31, X48 or Airlink 100
price: £16.50 adults, £12.00 children (under 3s go free), £14 concessions (includes students). Family and group discounts available
content: Watch the world famous Penguin Parade, and visit the acclaimed new (2008) ''Budongo Trail'' chimpanzee attraction. The only koalas in the UK are here, and there are some beautiful tropical birds. Home to the UK's only giant pandas.
